page.title: 07Village Hall Activities
page.content: In 1985 the hall is still managed by a voluntary committee composed of representatives of all the organisations using the hall. These range from the youngest,the{Pre-school {Play Group,}to the older folk of the {Friendship Club.}The playing field is used by the{Tennis, Cricket}and {Football Clubs. Parish Meetings, {Horticultural Shows, Discos, Fashion {Shows}and{Private Parties}are among other events held in the hall. This year the kitchen will be refitted to give more space and facilities. The money for this project is being raised by grants, loans and various fund raising events. Â£1,000 still needs to be raised and local groups are working hard to bridge the gap.
